name: Imperial Decree
Lore: 'To Imperial command personnel: The Rebellion must be crushed! Minor acts of sedition are to be ignored. The destruction of the Alliance is your primary goal.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. Whenever you control any two Rebel Base locations, or any one planet site and two systems, the effects of Revolution and all opponent''s Force drain bonuses are canceled. (Immune to Alter.)',
